QuestData.Title: Clear Victory
QuestData.Description:
<The ghostly captain continues to fight as she speaks, once more locked into the heat of battle, unaware the war has been over for centuries.>
What are you doing standing around? We've ground them down to their final warriors and those damnable runic constructs, but the war isn't over yet!
Colonel Waycrest needs us to hold this line! Kill as many of those Drust as you can and we might see the end of this war, today. Get back out there!
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad, marine! We might make a proper soldier out of you yet!$b$bThey'll make Colonel Waycrest a Lord for this, I'm sure. Your bravery will be remembered.
